Proper Form: Stand center; pull in wide arc to meet in front.
Pulleys at bottom; pull upward toward chin.

Description: Isolates rear delts and improves posture.
Proper Form: Cross cables; pull arms back horizontally.
Staggered stance; press forward like bench.

Description: Targets the middle portion of the pecs.
Proper Form: Pulleys at chest height; pull to sternum.
Use straight bar; shrug to ears; arms straight.
Pulleys at shoulder height; curl toward ears.

Description: Smooth overhead press with consistent resistance.
Proper Form: Press from shoulders to full lockout.
One low pulley; pull across to opposite shoulder.

Description: Enhanced range for lat width and depth.
Proper Form: Kneel; cross arms for handles; pull to ribs.
Lie on incline bench; pull handles above face.
Lie on flat bench; pull handles in wide arc.

Description: Combines stability with oblique side bends.
Proper Form: Kneel on balance trainer; crunch then bend side.
